Title: Requires the public service commission and the Long Island power authority to establish standards of acceptable performance for gas and electric corporations
Summary: Requires the public service commission and the Long Island power authority to establish standards of acceptable performance for gas and electric corporations.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the public service commission and the Long Island power authority to establish standards of acceptable performance for gas and electric corporations
